Description: Book of the Dead of Khonsiu; black line vignette at top; Hieratic text in red and black ink.
Curator's comments: Other parts of the same papyrus are BM EA10045, Zagreb 886 and Vienna KHM 3856-8, 3862, 3864 and 3866-9. Being studied as part of PhD by Ulrike Weinmann (University of Wuerzburg).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (108)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (56958) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/56958)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, cockled Black ink Red ink Backed: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Sandwich: board Binding: cloth (loose) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
